title: Kings Mountain National Military Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials The park offers a wide array of materials to explore the Battle of Kings Mountain and the Revolutionary War. You and your students will have the opportunity to learn about the experiences of some of the groups of people involved. All Curriculum Materials     Field Trips Field trips are a great chance for students to learn about the history at Kings Mountain. Please call 864-936-7921 to schedule your visit.  All Field Trips     Traveling Trunks Our Traveling Trunks are designed so that teachers and students can receive hands-on educational materials about the 18th Century and Battle of Kings Mountain.  The Traveling Trunks include lesson plans, games, 18th Century clothes and more. Contact the park to reserve a Traveling Trunk. All Traveling Trunks
